alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Northwest Middlesex County (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 9:59PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Worcester, northwestern Middlesex and east central Franklin Counties through 1100 PM EDT... At 959 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Phillipston, or 8 miles southeast of Orange, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Locations impacted include... Leominster, Fitchburg, Orange, Westford, Acton, Gardner, Concord, Athol, Pepperell, Tyngsborough, Groton, Winchendon, Lunenburg, Townsend, Littleton, Lancaster, Templeton, Rutland, Sterling and Ayer. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.

area.areaDesc: Central Middlesex County; Northwest Middlesex County
